rows.label: tlk70000009_03_msg0001
rows.name:
Things may look peaceful again here
now, but on the day of the attack, this
place was the stuff of nightmares.

rows.label: tlk70000009_03_msg0002
rows.name:
It took everything I could muster just to
dodge the enemies' attacks and deliver
word to the main forces.

rows.label: tlk70000009_03_msg0003
rows.name:
Now I understand why watchtower
guards need to be elite. The place gets
attacked before reinforcements arrive.

rows.label: tlk70000009_03_msg0004
rows.name:
You need to be strong just to survive
in that kind of situation, never mind
fighting back...

rows.label: tlk70000009_03_msg0005
rows.name:
It's a whole lot harder than guarding
the gate, I can tell you.

rows.label: tlk70000009_03_msg0006
rows.name:
I sound like I'm boasting, but it's been a
humbling experience. I'm worried that
I've bitten off more than I can chew.

rows.label: tlk70000009_03_msg0007
rows.name:
Maybe I'm not as ready as I thought
I was... No wonder my big bro still
treats me like a kid.

rows.label: tlk70000009_03_msg0008
rows.name:
Ah, dammit. I just wish I had a bit more
time for training.
